Name: Frequency of SW-EIC Reject across all process variants
Percentage of process variants ending with SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-EIC Reject occurrences that are immediately preceded by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Percentage of SW-EIC Reject cases that follow at least one occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-EIC Reject in comparison to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-EIC Reject' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-EIC Reject among all activities performed by the SYSTEM performer
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-EIC Reject that occur without any prior SW-Reviewer Agreed activity
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Ratio of SW-EIC Reject to total number of manuscript submissions (proxied by Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of SW-EIC Reject occurring in variants where SW-Reviewer Declined appears more than three times
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-EIC Reject in variants that include Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded
Metric: Number of 'SW-EIC Reject' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Number of SW-EIC Reject instances that occur within 7 days of the last reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Percentage of SW-EIC Reject in cases where no reviewer ever agreed (i.e., absence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the trace)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-EIC Reject events per month to identify temporal trends
Percentage of SW-EIC Reject out of all final editorial decisions (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-EIC Reject relative to the total number of EIC decision activities (including SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases
